mapper.sql: BARCODEID, SETNO, BARCODE, EMPNO, USERCNAME, SN, EFFECTIVEDATE, CREATEDATETIME, DISINFECTION, EOD, DEPNO, SETSN, STATUS, REQ_ID, RD_ID, POTID, CHECKING, CHECKINGTIME, CHECK_CONFIRM, USERNO, USERNAME, USERTIME, USING, RECEIVE, RECEIVETIME, RECEIVEUSERNO, RECEIVEUSERNAME, DATATIME, DATAUSERNAME, DATAUSERNO, LOCATION, WEARHOUSING, WEARHOUSEUSERNO, WEARHOUSEUSERNAME, WEARHOUSEDATETIME, PATIENTNO, PCASENO, DEPNOCRE, DEPNOSTORE, DEPNOPAY, DEPNOUSE, DELTIME, DELDEPNO, DELUSER, RECEIVEROOM, CLEARUSERNO, CLEARUSERNAME, UNPOT_USERNO, UNPOT_USERNAME, BI_HH, BI_MM, PACK_OK, BARCODE_OK, COLOR_OK, DRY_OK, TEMP_OK, DPOTNAME, DPOTSN
mapper.select:
select X.BARCODE as BARCODE,X.SETNO as SETNO,X.STATUS as STATUS, X.BARCODEID as BARCODEID,X.SETSN as SETSN, A.DEPNAME as LOCATION from CSR_BARCODE as X left join CSR_DEPNO as A on X.LOCATION = A.DEPNO where X.POTID in ( select ID from CSR_POLTLD
AND (DEPNO like '%'||(#{depno})||'%')
AND (POTNAME like '%'||(#{potname})||'%')
AND (POTNO like '%'||(#{potno})||'%')
AND (POTSN like '%'||(#{potsn})||'%')
AND POTSCANTIME like (select distinct to_char(#{potscantime},'yyyy-MM-dd') from CSR_POLTLD) ||'%');

select X.BARCODE as BARCODE,X.SETNO as SETNO,X.STATUS as STATUS,A.DEPNAME as LOCATION from CSR_BARCODE as X left join CSR_DEPNO as A on X.LOCATION = A.DEPNO
AND (X.DEPNO like '%'||(#{depno})||'%')
AND (X.BARCODE like '%'||(#{barcode})||'%')
AND (X.SETNO like '%'||(#{setno})||'%')
AND X.STATUS IN('1','2','3','4','5')
mapper.insert:
insert into CSR_BARCODE
SETNO,
BARCODE,
SN,
EFFECTIVEDATE,
CREATEDATETIME,
DISINFECTION,
EOD,

RD_ID,

RECEIVE,
DATAUSERNAME,
DATAUSERNO,
LOCATION,
WEARHOUSING,
DEPNOCRE,
DPOTSN,

#{barcode},
#{sn},
#{effectivedate},
#{createdatetime},
#{disinfection},
#{eod},
#{depno},
#{setsn},
#{status},

mapper.update:
update CSR_BARCODE set STATUS='3', LOCATION=#{depno}, DEPNOSTORE=#{depno}, WEARHOUSEUSERNO=#{userno}, WEARHOUSEUSERNAME=#{usercname}, WEARHOUSEDATETIME=#{date} where BARCODEID in
#{item}

update CSR_BARCODE
SETNO = #{setno,jdbcType=CHAR},
BARCODE = #{barcode,jdbcType=CHAR},
EMPNO = #{empno,jdbcType=CHAR},
USERCNAME = #{usercname,jdbcType=CHAR},
SN = #{sn,jdbcType=INTEGER},
EFFECTIVEDATE = #{effectivedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATEDATETIME = #{createdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DISINFECTION = #{disinfection,jdbcType=CHAR},
EOD = #{eod,jdbcType=CHAR},
DEPNO = #{depno,jdbcType=CHAR},
SETSN = #{setsn,jdbcType=CHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
REQ_ID = #{reqId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
RD_ID = #{rdId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
POTID = #{potid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CHECKING = #{checking,jdbcType=CHAR},
CHECKINGTIME = #{checkingtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CHECK_CONFIRM = #{checkConfirm,jdbcType=CHAR},
USERNO = #{userno,jdbcType=CHAR},
USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=CHAR},
USERTIME = #{usertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
USING = #{using,jdbcType=CHAR},
RECEIVE = #{receive,jdbcType=CHAR},
RECEIVETIME = #{receivetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RECEIVEUSERNO = #{receiveuserno,jdbcType=CHAR},
RECEIVEUSERNAME = #{receiveusername,jdbcType=CHAR},
DATATIME = #{datatime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DATAUSERNAME = #{datausername,jdbcType=CHAR},
DATAUSERNO = #{datauserno,jdbcType=CHAR},
LOCATION = #{location,jdbcType=CHAR},
WEARHOUSING = #{wearhousing,jdbcType=CHAR},
WEARHOUSEUSERNO = #{wearhouseuserno,jdbcType=CHAR},
WEARHOUSEUSERNAME = #{wearhouseusername,jdbcType=CHAR},
WEARHOUSEDATETIME = #{wearhousedatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PATIENTNO = #{patientno,jdbcType=CHAR},
PCASENO = #{pcaseno,jdbcType=CHAR},
DEPNOCRE = #{depnocre,jdbcType=CHAR},
DEPNOSTORE = #{depnostore,jdbcType=CHAR},
DEPNOPAY = #{depnopay,jdbcType=CHAR},
DEPNOUSE = #{depnouse,jdbcType=CHAR},
DELTIME = #{deltime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELDEPNO = #{deldepno,jdbcType=CHAR},
DELUSER = #{deluser,jdbcType=CHAR},
RECEIVEROOM = #{receiveroom,jdbcType=CHAR},
CLEARUSERNO = #{clearuserno,jdbcType=CHAR},
CLEARUSERNAME = #{clearusername,jdbcType=CHAR},
UNPOT_USERNO = #{unpotUserno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNPOT_USERNAME = #{unpotUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BI_HH = #{biHh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BI_MM = #{biMm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PACK_OK = #{packOk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BARCODE_OK = #{barcodeOk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COLOR_OK = #{colorOk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DRY_OK = #{dryOk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEMP_OK = #{tempOk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DPOTNAME = #{dpotname,jdbcType=CHAR},
DPOTSN = #{dpotsn,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where BARCODEID = #{barcodeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
